  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030908</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030908</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">La clonación</string>
            <string language="en">Cloning</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klonen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Clonage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cloning</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Clonazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κλωνοποίηση</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Trata sobre el proceso de clonación molecular, con el método celular y acelular, y la clonación de células tejidos, órganos y organismos, así como los problemas técnicos y éticos que plantea la clonación.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic dealing with molecular cloning, with the cellular and acellular method, and the cloning of cells, tissue, organs and organisms, as well as the technical and ethical problems which cloning poses.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">clonación</string>
            <string language="en">cloning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Reino Animal</string>
            <string language="en">Animal kingdom</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das molekulares Klonen, mit der zellularen
und acellular Methode beschäftigen, und das Klonen der Zellen, 
Gewebe, Organe und organismen, sowie die technischen und ethischen 
Probleme, die Klonen aufwirft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet traitant le clonage moléculaire, avec la 
méthode cellulaire et sans formation cellulaire, et le clonage des 
cellules, tissu, organes et organizations, aussi bien que les 
problèmes techniques et moraux que le clonage pose.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que tratam do cloning molecular, com o 
método celular e acellular, e o cloning das pilhas, tecido, órgãos 
e organismos, as.well.as os problemas técnicos e éticos que o 
cloning poses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che si occupano della clonazione 
molecolare, con il metodo cellulare ed acellular e la clonazione delle
cellule, tessuto, organi ed organismi, così come i problemi tecnici 
ed etici che la clonazione propone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξετάζουν τη μοριακή κλωνοποίηση, με την 
κυψελοειδή και acellular μέθοδο, και η κλωνοποίηση των 
κυττάρων, του ιστού, των οργάνων και των οργανισμών, καθώς 
επίσης και των τεχνικών και ηθικών προβλημάτων που η κλωνοποίηση 
δημιουργεί.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klonen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierkönigreich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">clonage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
